creator: Chefs Plate Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Chefs Plate is Canada’s first meal-kit delivery service, offering delicious dinner solutions at everyday low prices.
Download our new and improved app for FREE today to manage your account, explore our recipes and learn incredible cooking hacks! You can browse our upcoming menus, full recipes and select the delicious meals you want, all with the push of a button. You can also skip any week that doesn’t fit into your schedule – super easy!
Chefs Plate is Canada’s best value meal kit! We deliver all the ingredients you need to cook simple, delicious recipes in less than 30 minutes. With Chefs Plate you can save time and money on expensive trips to the grocery store and still get tasty, home-cooked meals on the dinner table!
Our App’s Features:
- You need to be a registered customer to use this app
- See our menu and select your meals
- Skip, or un-skip, weeks
- See when your deliveries are scheduled and delivered

descriptionShort: Farm Fresh Meals Delivered
title: Chefs Plate

creator: Chefs Plate Inc.
descriptionHtml:
As Canada’s first meal kit delivery service, Chefs Plate is a great way to plan your weekly recipe prep, cook a quick, wallet-friendly dinner that you’ll love to eat. Join Canadians from across the country that have discovered this money and time-saving recipe and meal planner.

With Chefs Plate, choose from 23 delicious recipes each week and get them delivered to your door. Your grocery delivery will come with step-by-step instructions and pre-measured ingredients you need to cook quick and delicious meals. Use our app as a weekly meal planner and explore the wide range of recipes you can be cooking and add to your diet plan. From 15 Minute meals to Balanced and vegetarian options, there are delicious meals everyone will love to cook, eat, and enjoy.

Download this meal planner app for FREE today!

HOW DOES CHEFS PLATE WORK?
-Get started by choosing a meal plan and the number of meals you want included in your weekly food delivery. Then select the recipes that suit your diet plan like vegan and vegetarian recipes and meal prep options for you to cook, eat, and enjoy.
-Skip a trip to the grocery store. Use the meal planner and pick a delivery date that works best for you. Your grocery delivery will be sent right to you and include step-by-step recipes and all the fresh pre-portioned ingredients you need for cooking your weekly meal prep.
-Get cooking with your food delivery and make a recipe that will be ready to eat in 15 to 30 minutes. Find new cooking hacks and your new favourite recipe that you’ll love to eat.

WHY CHEFS PLATE?
Chefs Plate helps you save time, effort, waste, and money. We know how time-consuming meal planning, grocery shopping, and meal prepping can be. After a long day, you don’t want to worry about cooking dinner and what to eat. Thanks to your food delivery, Chefs Plate takes the stress out of meal planning and cooking. creator: Chefs Plate Inc.
descriptionHtml:
As Canada’s first meal kit delivery service, Chefs Plate is a great way to plan your weekly recipe prep, cook a quick, wallet-friendly dinner that you’ll love to eat. Join Canadians from across the country that have discovered this money and time-saving recipe and meal planner.

With Chefs Plate, choose from 23 delicious recipes each week and get them delivered to your door. Your grocery delivery will come with step-by-step instructions and pre-measured ingredients you need to cook quick and delicious meals. Use our app as a weekly meal planner and explore the wide range of recipes you can be cooking and add to your diet plan. From 15 Minute meals to Balanced and vegetarian options, there are delicious meals everyone will love to cook, eat, and enjoy.

Download this meal planner app for FREE today!

HOW DOES CHEFS PLATE WORK?
-Get started by choosing a meal plan and the number of meals you want included in your weekly food delivery. Then select the recipes that suit your diet plan like vegan and vegetarian recipes and meal prep options for you to cook, eat, and enjoy.
-Skip a trip to the grocery store. Use the meal planner and pick a delivery date that works best for you. Your grocery delivery will be sent right to you and include step-by-step recipes and all the fresh pre-portioned ingredients you need for cooking your weekly meal prep.
-Get cooking with your food delivery and make a recipe that will be ready to eat in 15 to 30 minutes. Find new cooking hacks and your new favourite recipe that you’ll love to eat.

WHY CHEFS PLATE?
Chefs Plate helps you save time, effort, waste, and money. We know how time-consuming meal planning, grocery shopping, and meal prepping can be. After a long day, you don’t want to worry about cooking dinner and what to eat. Thanks to your food delivery, Chefs Plate takes the stress out of meal planning and cooking. In just 15 to 30 minutes, you can cook a tasty meal with your grocery delivery that fits your diet plan and is ready to eat and rave about with your friends and family.

Here’s how our meal planner makes cooking a recipe super simple:
-Every week, our team of incredible chefs put together a menu of 23 delicious recipes using fresh produce that are easy to cook. From comfort food faves to unique vegan and vegetarian recipes, there’s a recipe for everyone to love and eat in your grocery delivery.
-Stressed out from finding a recipe that you want to eat with your diet plan and cooking in general? Need a new favourite recipe to cook? The meal planner has you covered! Our team creates a wide array of recipes that fit your diet plan and feature cooking hacks that will help you conquer the kitchen. And say goodbye to grocery shopping. Your grocery delivery comes with pre-measured ingredients, so no food goes to waste.
-Choose a day that works best for you and we'll organize your grocery delivery and have it sent straight to your door. Our insulated boxes are designed to keep your food cool and fresh, so you don't need to be home at the time of your grocery delivery. Plus, you'll receive a link to track your grocery delivery on your meal planner app until it reaches your door.
-With our recipes and meal planner you won’t need any fancy equipment or techniques. Our mission is to help you cook smarter, not harder.

WHAT YOU’LL FIND ON THE CHEFS PLATE MEAL PLANNER APP?
-Cooking hacks for meal prep, along with step-by-step guides to help you devise a diet plan, prep your food delivery and recipe, and cook your meals.
-Use your account to choose your weekly meals for the next grocery delivery and food delivery. Easily change your subscription settings for your meal plan and change or skip your delivery date. Plus, track the status of your grocery delivery order.
-Use the meal planner and follow the step-by-step instructions of your recipe as you cook. Eat, enjoy, and review your favourite recipes.

With Chefs Plate, choose from 23 delicious recipes each week and get them delivered to your door. Your grocery delivery will come with step-by-step instructions and pre-measured ingredients you need to cook quick and delicious meals. Use our app as a weekly meal planner and explore the wide range of recipes you can be cooking and add to your diet plan. From 15 Minute meals to Balanced and vegetarian options, there are delicious meals everyone will love to cook, eat, and enjoy.

Download this meal planner app for FREE today!

HOW DOES CHEFS PLATE WORK?
-Get started by choosing a meal plan and the number of meals you want included in your weekly food delivery. Then select the recipes that suit your diet plan like vegan and vegetarian recipes and meal prep options for you to cook, eat, and enjoy.
-Skip a trip to the grocery store. Use the meal planner and pick a delivery date that works best for you. Your grocery delivery will be sent right to you and include step-by-step recipes and all the fresh pre-portioned ingredients you need for cooking your weekly meal prep.
-Get cooking with your food delivery and make a recipe that will be ready to eat in 15 to 30 minutes. Find new cooking hacks and your new favourite recipe that you’ll love to eat.

WHY CHEFS PLATE?
Chefs Plate helps you save time, effort, waste, and money. We know how time-consuming meal planning, grocery shopping, and meal prepping can be. After a long day, you don’t want to worry about cooking dinner and what to eat. Thanks to your food delivery, Chefs Plate takes the stress out of meal planning and cooking. In just 15 to 30 minutes, you can cook a tasty meal with your grocery delivery that fits your diet plan and is ready to eat and rave about with your friends and family.

Here’s how our meal planner makes cooking a recipe super simple:
-Every week, our team of incredible chefs put together a menu of 23 delicious recipes using fresh produce that are easy to cook. From comfort food faves to unique vegan and vegetarian recipes, there’s a recipe for everyone to love and eat in your grocery delivery.
-Stressed out from finding a recipe that you want to eat with your diet plan and cooking in general? Need a new favourite recipe to cook? The meal planner has you covered! Our team creates a wide array of recipes that fit your diet plan and feature cooking hacks that will help you conquer the kitchen. And say goodbye to grocery shopping. Your grocery delivery comes with pre-measured ingredients, so no food goes to waste.
-Choose a day that works best for you and we'll organize your grocery delivery and have it sent straight to your door. Our insulated boxes are designed to keep your food cool and fresh, so you don't need to be home at the time of your grocery delivery. Plus, you'll receive a link to track your grocery delivery on your meal planner app until it reaches your door.
-With our recipes and meal planner you won’t need any fancy equipment or techniques. Our mission is to help you cook smarter, not harder.

WHAT YOU’LL FIND ON THE CHEFS PLATE MEAL PLANNER APP?
-Cooking hacks for meal prep, along with step-by-step guides to help you devise a diet plan, prep your food delivery and recipe, and cook your meals.
-Use your account to choose your weekly meals for the next grocery delivery and food delivery. Easily change your subscription settings for your meal plan and change or skip your delivery date. Plus, track the status of your grocery delivery order.
-Use the meal planner and follow the step-by-step instructions of your recipe as you cook. Eat, enjoy, and review your favourite recipes.
